It's a great first person shooter with a wide variety of modes so it doesn't get old. I believe there are still some hackers but I haven't seen any recently so that may mean they are cracking down on the hackers because they understand they will lose players if they do not take care of that problem. Overall a great game, 5 stars for sure!
